itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Lead Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Lead Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Lead Shards. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Metal Solvent
item.desc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Seleth Longsword
item.desc: A longsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Longbow
item.desc: A longbow possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Amulet
item.desc: An amulet possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Axe
item.desc: An axe possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Ferry Decoration
item.desc:
A decoration that can be attached to a Ferry, lowering the chance of Trade Items breaking.
When 3 or more set items are installed:
Movement Speed +2%

- Can be Installed on: Ferry

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Maple Float
item.desc: A float made of maple wood. Good for catching rare fishes.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Ash Tree Float
item.desc: A float made of ash wood. Good for catching big fishes.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Calpheon Fishing Rod
item.desc: Calpheon fishing rod. ...And it was super effective!\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Trade Wagon Badge
item.desc:
A banner for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Seleth Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Shortsword of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Shortsword of Destruction, Seleth Shortsword

item.name: Seleth Shortsword of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Seleth Shortsword

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Shortsword
item.desc:
A Seleth Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Seleth Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Seleth Shortsword of Destruction, Seleth Shortsword of Temptation, Seleth Shortsword

item.name: Seleth Shortsword of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Shortsword of Temptation, Seleth Shortsword
